com.kousikraj.bootstrap.services
Class AbstractService

java.lang.Object
  com.kousikraj.bootstrap.services.AbstractService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
DummyService, TestService
public abstract class AbstractService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service

This class is Abstract implementation of Service. This class can be extended by any Custom Service we are creating.

Author:
KousikRaj

Method Detail

init

public void init(Bootstrap bootstrapLoader,
                 java.lang.Object args)
This method is for initializing any Service. Here we need to prepare any service to get ready to be started. The successful invocation will put the service to ServiceState.INIT mode.

Specified by:
init in interface Service

start

public void start(Bootstrap bootstrapLoader,
                  java.lang.Object args)
This method is for starting the Service where it will be available to be accessed. The successful invocation will put the service to ServiceState .STARTED mode

Specified by:
start in interface Service

reboot

public void reboot(Bootstrap bootstrapLoader,
                   java.lang.Object args)
This method is for rebooting the Service by invoking stop, init and start methods sequentially

Specified by:
reboot in interface Service

stop

public void stop(Bootstrap bootstrapLoader,
                 java.lang.Object args)
This method is for stopping the Service where it will be not be available to be accessed. The successful invocation will put the service to ServiceState .STOPPED mode

Specified by:
stop in interface Service

getType

public ServiceType getType()
This method is to get the ServiceType of the Service. Bt default, it is considered as ServiceType.ESSENTIAL service, if it has to be ServiceType.ADDON then we need to override this method in the Service implementation

Specified by:
getType in interface Service
Returns:
ServiceType
